description: Manages document signing flows via the Doxi Sign API, including creation, editing, status checks, and attachment management.

methods.name: GetAllFlows
methods.summary: Retrieves all signing flows available for the current tenant.

methods.name: AddSignFlow
methods.summary: Creates a new signing flow and uploads a document for signing.

params.createFlowJsonRequest: Flow definition including recipients, elements, and metadata.
params.documentFile: PDF document bytes to upload (send as base64 when calling via JSON).

methods.name: EditSignFlow
methods.summary: Edits an existing signing flow, replacing documents or parameters.

params.request: Edits to apply to an existing flow (document updates, recipients, fields).

methods.name: GetDocument
methods.summary: Downloads a document (PDF) associated with a signing flow.

params.signFlowId: The unique ID of the signing flow.
params.withSigns: Whether to include visual signatures in the returned PDF (default: true).

methods.name: GetFlow
methods.summary: Retrieves metadata for a specific signing flow.

params.signFlowId: The unique ID of the signing flow.

methods.name: SearchFlow
methods.summary: Searches flows using filters (status, date, signer, etc.).

params.request: Filter object for searching flows (status, date range, signer, custom fields).

methods.name: GetFlowsStatus
methods.summary: Retrieves statuses for multiple flows.

params.request: Array of flow IDs to fetch statuses for.

methods.name: GetFlowStatus
methods.summary: Retrieves current status for a single flow.

params.signFlowId: The unique ID of the signing flow.

methods.name: SetFlowAction
methods.summary: Performs an action on a flow (approve, reject, etc.).

params.signFlowId: The unique ID of the signing flow.
params.request: Action to perform on the flow (StopFlow, ResendDeclinedFlow, SendReminder, ArchiveFlow, ReleaseFlow).

methods.name: SetSignatures
methods.summary: Sets or updates signatures for a specific flow.

params.signFlowId: The unique ID of the signing flow.
params.request: Signature operation (Approve/Decline/Save) and optional field values, attachments, or metadata.

methods.name: ReplaceSigner
methods.summary: Replaces a signer in an existing flow.

params.request: Payload to replace an existing signer with a new signer (including contact details and flags).

methods.name: GetFlowAttachments
methods.summary: Retrieves all attachments associated with a flow.

params.signFlowId: The unique ID of the signing flow.

methods.name: GetFlowAttachmentField
methods.summary: Retrieves a specific attachment field from a flow.

params.signFlowId: The unique ID of the signing flow.
params.request: Element label plus signer identification of the attachment field to download.

methods.name: AddAttachmentAsBase64ToFlow
methods.summary: Adds a base64-encoded attachment to a signing flow.

params.signFlowId: The unique ID of the signing flow.
params.request: Attachment file (name and base64 content) and the user who added it.

methods.name: CreateFlowFromTemplate
methods.summary: Creates a new signing flow from a template

params.request: Values and recipients to hydrate the template when creating a flow.

methods.name: AddTemplate
methods.summary: Creates a new user template

params.request: Template metadata and file(s) to add.

methods.name: UpdateTemplate
methods.summary: Updates an existing template

params.request: New metadata, file(s), or settings to update.

methods.name: DeleteUserTemplate
methods.summary: Deletes a user template

params.request: Delete options for the template.

methods.name: GetTemplate
methods.summary: Retrieves template metadata

methods.name: DeleteAttachmentFromTemplate
methods.summary: Deletes an attachment from a template

methods.name: DocumentInfo
methods.summary: Extracts information from a document file

params.document: Document bytes (PDF); send as base64 when calling via JSON.

methods.name: DocumentInfoBase64
methods.summary: Extracts information from a document provided as base64

params.request: GetDocumentInfoRquest containing base64-encoded document.

methods.name: SearchInDocumentBase64
methods.summary: Searches for text or patterns in a base64-encoded document

params.request: SearchInDocumentBase64Request with base64 document and search query/options.

methods.name: SearchInDocument
methods.summary: Searches for text or patterns in an uploaded document

params.file: Document bytes (PDF); send as base64 in JSON.
params.request: SearchInDocumentRequest with query/options.

methods.name: MergeDocuments
methods.summary: Merges multiple documents into a single file

params.documents: Collection of document byte arrays to merge (order is preserved).

methods.name: AddKit
methods.summary: Creates a new kit

params.request: Kit definition aggregating documents/flows.

methods.name: UpdateKit
methods.summary: Updates an existing kit

params.request: Update payload for the kit.

methods.name: GetKit
methods.summary: Retrieves kit metadata

methods.name: GetKits
methods.summary: Lists kits for the tenant

methods.name: GetFormSettings
methods.summary: Downloads form settings for a company form

methods.name: GetUserGroups
methods.summary: Retrieves groups for a user identified by key type and value

params.searchType: User key type (UserId, UserEmail, UserPhone, UserName, GroupId).

methods.name: GetUserTemplates
methods.summary: Retrieves templates of a user identified by key type and value

params.searchType: User key type (UserId, UserEmail, UserPhone, UserName, GroupId).

methods.name: GetUserIdByEmail
methods.summary: Retrieves the user ID by email

methods.name: GetUsers
methods.summary: Queries users with filter parameters

params.queryParams: Key-value filters (e.g., page, pageSize, name, email).

methods.name: AddSubscription
methods.summary: Adds a new webhook subscription

params.request: WebhookSubscription configuration (target URL, events, secret, headers).

methods.name: WebHookCheck
methods.summary: Validates and previews a webhook payload

params.request: WebhookSubscription to validate/preview (no persistence).

methods.name: GetAllWebhookSubscription
methods.summary: Lists all webhook subscriptions

methods.name: SearchWebhookCallLogs
methods.summary: Searches webhook call logs for a subscription

params.request: RequestWebhookSenderLog search filters (date range, status, pagination).

methods.name: UpdateWebhookSubscription
methods.summary: Updates a webhook subscription

params.request: WebhookSubscription updates.

methods.name: DeleteSubscription
methods.summary: Deletes a webhook subscription
